將三叉戟擲向任何物品。

Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

old_value: 你可以喺遊戲入面試玩五日（約為現實世界嘅 1 小時 40 分鐘）。喺選單嘅「進度」選項入面，可以揾到啲有幫助嘅提示。希望你玩得開心！
old_en_us: This demo will last 5 ingame days (about 1 hour and 40 minutes of real time). Check the advancements for hints! Have fun!
new_value: 你可以在遊戲中試玩五天（約為現實世界的 1 小時 40 分鐘）。在選單的「進度」選項中，可以找到一些有幫助的提示。希望你玩得開心！
new_en_us: This demo will last 5 in-game days (about 1 hour and 40 minutes of real time). Check the advancements for hints! Have fun!

old_value: 試玩時間已經結束，請購買遊戲來繼續，或者重新開始一個新嘅世界！
old_en_us: The demo time has expired, buy the game to continue or start a new world!
new_value: 試玩時間已經結束，請購買遊戲來繼續，或者重新開始一個新的世界！
new_en_us: The demo time has expired. Buy the game to continue or start a new world!

old_value: 驗證伺服器暫停運作，正在進行維護。
old_en_us: The authentication servers are currently down for maintenance.
new_value: 暫時無法連線到驗證伺服器，請稍後再試。
new_en_us: The authentication servers are currently not reachable. Please try again.

new_value: 快捷欄已儲存（按 %1$s + %2$s 復原）

old_value: 驗證伺服器暫停服務，請稍後再試，唔好意思！
old_en_us: Authentication servers are down. Please try again later, sorry!
new_value: 驗證伺服器暫停服務。請稍後再試。抱歉！
new_en_us: Authentication servers are down. Please try again later. Sorry!

new_value: 客户端版本不相容！請使用 %s

old_en_us: Can't deliver chat message starting with %s, check server logs
new_value: 無法傳送聊天訊息，請檢查伺服器紀錄：%s
new_en_us: Can't deliver chat message; check server logs: %s

old_value: 線上遊玩時，你可能會遇到未受分級嘅聊天訊息或由玩家生成嘅內容。可能唔適合所有年齡層。
old_en_us: During online play you may be exposed to chat messages or other types of user generated content that has not been rated, and may not be suitable for all ages.
new_value: 警吿：線上遊戲由第三方伺服器提供，這些伺服器並非由 Mojang Studios 或 Microsoft 擁有、營運及監管。遊玩線上遊戲時，你可能會見到未經審核的聊天訊息或其他類型的用户創造內容，這些內容未必適合所有人。
new_en_us: Caution: Online play is offered by third-party servers that are not owned, operated, or supervised by Mojang Studios or Microsoft. During online play, you may be exposed to unmoderated chat messages or other types of user-generated content that may not be suitable for everyone.

new_value: 試圖載入未來版本的世界時發生錯誤。此操作本身就有風險，很抱歉無法載入。
new_en_us: Something went wrong while trying to load a world from a future version. This was a risky operation to begin with; sorry it didn't work.
